Text: Once again, thank you. I'm looking forward to hours of listening to new songs.

ur welcome. Shankly aims to please :) 

Mega Dance remix upload on its way at the end of June for all you dance lovers.
Son of Shankly, where are you? I'm getting scared here. I need my mixtapes fix. Badly. *starts to shake uncontrollably*
On its way today. A bit late. The great Shankly was in hospital for a while, but I\'m glad to say the new mixtape will be up later today.

I can finally log in again!

I'm hoping the site recontruction shenanigans hasn't deterred my favourite uploader from doing his sublime work. Big hugs to you Shankly, please come back to us!
